title: Larry (Buz) Coker
maintext: FORSYTH — Larry (Buz) Coker, 65, of Forsyth, went with Jesus on June 7, 2017, after a courageous fight with brain cancer. His life was marked by love for his family and service for others. Buz served in the US Army Field Artillery for 25 years, retiring as a full colonel. Buz has been active with Lee Ranch of Forsyth for 18 years. He leaves behind his beloved wife, Ellen (Lee), 4 children with their families, loving Coker and Lee Family members and many friends. His Family will receive Friends from 2-6 p.m., Tuesday, June 20, with Funeral Services at 10 a.m., Wednesday June 21, all at 1st Baptist Church of Forsyth. Burial with full Military Honors will follow in the Forsyth Cemetery. Stevenson and Sons Funeral Home of Forsyth is assisting with the arrangements. To read the full obituary and leave condolences for the family please visit www.stevensonandsons.com .
